answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some sample slow vehicle ordinances you can use as a reference for your own.
City of Stuart, FL
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3720
The City of Manzanita, OR
http://www.ci.manzanita.or.us/_docs/ordinances/Ordinance09-03.pdf
The State of Delaware
http://www.dmv.de.gov/services/vehicle_services/other/sb17_low_speed_vehicle.pdf
The Insurance Institute for Highway Safety has compiled a list of maximum speeds for low speed vehicles.
http://www.iihs.org/laws/lowspeedvehicles.aspx
I have also included some state policies for low speed vehicles.
This is a recent bill from Illinois regarding low speed vehicle restrictions.
http://www.ilga.gov/legislation/BillStatus.asp?DocNum=1866&GAID=10&DocTypeID=SB&SessionID=76
This is an informational page from the California DMV regarding golf carts and other similar vehicles.
http://dmv.ca.gov/pubs/brochures/fast_facts/ffvr37.htm
Here is a similar page from the Wisconsin DMV.
http://www.dot.state.wi.us/drivers/vehicles/title/nev.htm
Ali Iannolo 
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Michael Cramer
text: I am looking for any communities in the state of Michigan that have a Golf Cart Ordinance.  Does anyone have such an ordinance?  Thanks for the help.
title: Low Speed Vehicle or Golf Cart Ordinance
